LogPublishingOptions.description: Key-value pairs to configure log publishing.

properties.name: CloudWatchLogDestination
properties.description: The destination for OpenSearch Ingestion Service logs sent to Amazon CloudWatch.

type.description: The destination for OpenSearch Ingestion Service logs sent to Amazon CloudWatch.

Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

VpcOptions.description: Container for the values required to configure VPC access for the pipeline. If you don't specify these values, OpenSearch Ingestion Service creates the pipeline with a public endpoint.

properties.name: SecurityGroupIds
properties.description: A list of security groups associated with the VPC endpoint.

type.description: A list of security groups associated with the VPC endpoint.

properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: A list of subnet IDs associated with the VPC endpoint.

type.description: A list of subnet IDs associated with the VPC endpoint.

VpcEndpoint.description: An OpenSearch Ingestion Service-managed VPC endpoint that will access one or more pipelines.

properties.name: VpcEndpointId
properties.description: The unique identifier of the endpoint.

type.description: The unique identifier of the endpoint.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: The ID for your VPC. AWS Privatelink generates this value when you create a VPC.

type.description: The ID for your VPC. AWS Privatelink generates this value when you create a VPC.

resource.description: An OpenSearch Ingestion Service Data Prepper pipeline running Data Prepper.

properties.name: MaxUnits
properties.description: The maximum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion Compute Units (ICUs).

type.description: The maximum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion Compute Units (ICUs).

properties.name: MinUnits
properties.description: The minimum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion Compute Units (ICUs).

type.description: The minimum pipeline capacity, in Ingestion Compute Units (ICUs).

properties.name: PipelineConfigurationBody
properties.description: The Data Prepper pipeline configuration in YAML format.

type.description: The Data Prepper pipeline configuration in YAML format.

properties.name: PipelineName
properties.description: Name of the OpenSearch Ingestion Service pipeline to create. Pipeline names are unique across the pipelines owned by an account within an AWS Region.

type.description: Name of the OpenSearch Ingestion Service pipeline to create. Pipeline names are unique across the pipelines owned by an account within an AWS Region.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

attributes.description: An OpenSearch Ingestion Service Data Prepper pipeline running Data Prepper.

properties.name: VpcEndpoints
properties.description: The VPC interface endpoints that have access to the pipeline.

type.description: The VPC interface endpoints that have access to the pipeline.

properties.name: PipelineArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline.

properties.name: IngestEndpointUrls
properties.description: A list of endpoints that can be used for ingesting data into a pipeline

type.description: A list of endpoints that can be used for ingesting data into a pipeline
